__e: But he is still in American airspace, Which means you still have jurisdiction, And I have a new claim -- asylum.
My family's here because I'm seeking political asylum.
Your friend at the State Department, you trust he can do what he says, give us asylum?
I don't know how you can call yourself a man of God... when you hide that evil son of a bitch.
Thanks for telling so many people about my school.
Along with the fact that you're harboring his daughter.
Her parents are putting him in daycare which I can't afford. How am I supposed to compete with that?
[ laughing ] Yes, yes, it also has a new daycare centre.
My point is, I've been doing a difficult job, some might call it lousy, a day care teacher for very small children who drain the life out of your every single day, and do I get to quit my job?
Well, I think I could manage keeping John here, so he can go to his same nursery and not have any changes, and you could fly in every other weekend or something?
Yeah, because you're her mom, right, and it's her first day at day care, and you're first day back at work.
His problems weren't getting into the right preschool and having the coolest sneakers.
